sentences: Co-Chair Edenhofer updated delegates on the preparation of the Special Report (IPCC-XXXI/Doc.8), noting the replacement of Coordinating Lead Author Wolfram Krewitt, who passed away, with Ralph Sims.
He informed the delegates on the second lead author meeting, held in September 2009 in Oslo, Norway, which resulted in the addition of a chapter on hydropower, among other outcomes.
He further noted two proposed expert meetings: one on modeling renewable energy and another with the participation of business stakeholders.
This was followed by a discussion on the attendance of meetings (invitees, finance for experts travel, and representation by developing countries).
The UK, supported by Spain, proposed that focal points should be made aware of who is invited to facilitate the process of sending experts to meetings.
